name: THANE SOCIETY FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUELTY TO ANIMALS
briefDescription: Running the ONLY hospital for sick, injured and abandoned street animals in the district of Thane, India, supported by 3 rescue vehicles, a cohesive team of Trustees and a 19 member staff, we treat more than 6000 wild and domestic animals in any given year.We fight animal cruelty cases,plant trees,Open employment opportunities to people below poverty line. Our Objective is to run a modern state of the art facility for animals and a wildlife rescue and rehabilitation centre with an Education Centre, in the future.Please visit us at www.thanespca.org and at http://www.guidestarindia.org/Summary.aspx?CCReg=1894
